notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was performed, in part, under the auspices of the U.S. Department of Energy by Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory under Contract DE-AC52-07NA27344 to G.L.H., M.F., M.K.B. Additional support came from NIH R21AI128953 (G.L.H. and I.E.B.-V.), K01AI128005 (G.L.H.), Texas A&M AgriLife Insect Vector Seed Grant (G.L.H. and I.E.B.-V.), CONACyT-MEXBOL (No. 295569), IPN (SIP 20181120 and 20195706) to M.A.R.-P. This publication was supported by Cooperative Agreement Number U01CK000512 (G.L.H. and I.E.B.-V.) and contract 200-2017-93141 (G.L.H. and I.E.B.-V.), funded by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. Its contents are solely the responsibility of the authors and do not necessarily represent the official views of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention or the Department of Health and Human Services.
